titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Stanford University, Army Specialized Training Program, Photographs
Stanford University, Army Specialized Training Program, Photographs

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit

did.head: Overview
did.unittitle: Stanford University, Army Specialized Training Program, photographs
did.abstract: Collection includes photographs taken by Gubman of campus scenes, including two where ASTP students are in the frame, three images of his class (photographer unknown), and one booklet ?Student Trainees in Army Programs 1943-1944? [list of participants in the Civil Affairs Training School, Women?s Army Corps, and Army Specialized Training Program].

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Ownership & Copyright
userestrict.p: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from, or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the Head of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California 94304-6064. Consent is given on behalf of Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/depts/spc/pubserv/permissions.html.
Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: Stanford University, Army Specialized Training Program, Photographs (PC0111). Department of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Sketch
bioghist.p: Martin Gubman studied Russian in the Army Specialized Training Program at Stanford University during World War II.

scopecontent.head: Description of the Collection
scopecontent.p: Collection includes photographs taken by Gubman of campus scenes, including two where ASTP students are in the frame, three images of his class (photographer unknown), and one booklet ?Student Trainees in Army Programs 1943-1944? [list of participants in the Civil Affairs Training School, Women?s Army Corps, and Army Specialized Training Program].
